view

Interface IModelControlAdapter<TDropListItem,TDropListItem2>

  • Type Parameters:
    TDropListItem - The type of objects put into the view's drop lists.
    TDropListItem2 - The type of objects put into the paint drop list.

    public interface IModelControlAdapter<TDropListItem,TDropListItem2>
    Adapter that the view uses to communicate to the model for non-repetitive control tasks such as manipulating strategies.
    Author:
    swong

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TDropListItem2 addPaint(java.lang.String classname)
      Take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.

      Take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.
      void clearBalls()
      clear balls from ball model

    • Method Detail

      • addStrategy

        TDropListItem addStrategy(java.lang.String classname)
        Take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.
        Parameters:
        classname - The shortened class name of the desired strategy
        Returns:
        Something to put onto both the drop lists.

      • addPaint

        TDropListItem2 addPaint(java.lang.String classname)
        Take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.
        Parameters:
        classname - The name of paint strategy
        Returns:
        Something to put onto both the drop lists.

      • combineStrategies

        TDropListItem combineStrategies(TDropListItem selectedItem1,
                                TDropListItem selectedItem2)
        Return a new object to put on both lists, given two items from the lists.
        Parameters:
        selectedItem1 - An object from one drop list
        selectedItem2 - An object from the other drop list
        Returns:
        An object to put back on both lists.

      • makeBall

        void makeBall(TDropListItem selectedItem1,
              TDropListItem2 selectedItem2)
        Make a ball with the selected short strategy name.
        Parameters:
        selectedItem1 - A shorten class name for the desired strategy
        selectedItem2 - A shorten class name for the desired strategy

      • makeSwitcherBall

        void makeSwitcherBall(TDropListItem2 selectedItem2)
        Make a ball that can switch to a new strategy
        Parameters:
        selectedItem2 - A shorten class name for the desired strategy

      • switchBalls

        void switchBalls(TDropListItem selectedItem)
        Switch all switcher ball to selected strategy
        Parameters:
        selectedItem - The current selected name in the first drop-list

      • clearBalls

        void clearBalls()
        clear balls from ball model
